00059 #if SIZEOF_LONG == 8
00060 #define BPL 64
00061 #define LOGBPL 6
00062 #else
00063 #define BPL 32
00064 #define LOGBPL 5
00065 #endif
00066

00096 static void ddSuppInteract ARGS((DdNode *f, int *support));
00097 static void ddClearLocal ARGS((DdNode *f));
00098 static void ddUpdateInteract ARGS((DdManager *table, int *support));
00099 static void ddClearGlobal ARGS((DdManager *table));

00113 
00126 void
00127 cuddSetInteract(
00128   DdManager * table,
00129   int  x,
00130   int  y)
00131 {
00132     int posn, word, bit;
00133 
00134 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00135     assert(x < y);
00136     assert(y < table->size);
00137     assert(x >= 0);
00138 #endif
00139 
00140     posn = ((((table->size << 1) - x - 3) * x) >> 1) + y - 1;
00141     word = posn >> LOGBPL;
00142     bit = posn & (BPL-1);
00143     table->interact[word] |= 1L << bit;
00144 
00145 } /* end of cuddSetInteract */
00146 
00147 
00161 int
00162 cuddTestInteract(
00163   DdManager * table,
00164   int  x,
00165   int  y)
00166 {
00167     int posn, word, bit, result;
00168 
00169     if (x > y) {
00170         int tmp = x;
00171         x = y;
00172         y = tmp;
00173     }
00174 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00175     assert(x < y);
00176     assert(y < table->size);
00177     assert(x >= 0);
00178 #endif
00179 
00180     posn = ((((table->size << 1) - x - 3) * x) >> 1) + y - 1;
00181     word = posn >> LOGBPL;
00182     bit = posn & (BPL-1);
00183     result = (table->interact[word] >> bit) & 1L;
00184     return(result);
00185 
00186 } /* end of cuddTestInteract */

00207 int
00208 cuddInitInteract(
00209   DdManager * table)
00210 {
00211     int i,j,k;
00212     int words;
00213     long *interact;
00214     int *support;
00215     DdNode *f;
00216 #ifdef __osf__
00217 #pragma pointer_size save
00218 #pragma pointer_size short
00219 #endif
00220     DdNode **nodelist;
00221 #ifdef __osf__
00222 #pragma pointer_size restore
00223 #endif
00224     int slots;
00225     int n = table->size;
00226 
00227     words = ((n * (n-1)) >> (1 + LOGBPL)) + 1;
00228     table->interact = interact = ALLOC(long,words);
00229     if (interact == NULL) {
00230         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00231         return(0);
00232     }
00233     for (i = 0; i < words; i++) {
00234         interact[i] = 0;
00235     }
00236 
00237     support = ALLOC(int,n);
00238     if (support == NULL) {
00239         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00240         FREE(interact);
00241         return(0);
00242     }
00243 
00244     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00245         nodelist = table->subtables[i].nodelist;
00246         slots = table->subtables[i].slots;
00247         for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
00248             f = nodelist[j];
00249             while (f != NULL) {
00250                 /* A node is a root of the DAG if it cannot be
00251                 ** reached by nodes above it. If a node was never
00252                 ** reached during the previous depth-first searches,
00253                 ** then it is a root, and we start a new depth-first
00254                 ** search from it.
00255                 */
00256                 if (!Cudd_IsComplement(f->next)) {
00257                     for (k = 0; k < n; k++) {
00258                         support[k] = 0;
00259                     }
00260                     ddSuppInteract(f,support);
00261                     ddClearLocal(f);
00262                     ddUpdateInteract(table,support);
00263                 }
00264                 f = Cudd_Regular(f->next);
00265             }
00266         }
00267     }
00268     ddClearGlobal(table);
00269 
00270     FREE(support);
00271     return(1);
00272 
00273 } /* end of cuddInitInteract */

00293 static void
00294 ddSuppInteract(
00295   DdNode * f,
00296   int * support)
00297 {
00298     if (cuddIsConstant(f) || Cudd_IsComplement(cuddT(f))) {
00299         return;
00300     }
00301 
00302     support[f->index] = 1;
00303     ddSuppInteract(cuddT(f),support);
00304     ddSuppInteract(Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f)),support);
00305     /* mark as visited */
00306     cuddT(f) = Cudd_Complement(cuddT(f));
00307     f->next = Cudd_Complement(f->next);
00308     return;
00309 
00310 } /* end of ddSuppInteract */
00311 
00312 
00324 static void
00325 ddClearLocal(
00326   DdNode * f)
00327 {
00328     if (cuddIsConstant(f) || !Cudd_IsComplement(cuddT(f))) {
00329         return;
00330     }
00331     /* clear visited flag */
00332     cuddT(f) = Cudd_Regular(cuddT(f));
00333     ddClearLocal(cuddT(f));
00334     ddClearLocal(Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f)));
00335     return;
00336 
00337 } /* end of ddClearLocal */
00338 
00339 
00353 static void
00354 ddUpdateInteract(
00355   DdManager * table,
00356   int * support)
00357 {
00358     int i,j;
00359     int n = table->size;
00360 
00361     for (i = 0; i < n-1; i++) {
00362         if (support[i] == 1) {
00363             for (j = i+1; j < n; j++) {
00364                 if (support[j] == 1) {
00365                     cuddSetInteract(table,i,j);
00366                 }
00367             }
00368         }
00369     }
00370 
00371 } /* end of ddUpdateInteract */
00372 
00373 
00387 static void
00388 ddClearGlobal(
00389   DdManager * table)
00390 {
00391     int i,j;
00392     DdNode *f;
00393 #ifdef __osf__
00394 #pragma pointer_size save
00395 #pragma pointer_size short
00396 #endif
00397     DdNode **nodelist;
00398 #ifdef __osf__
00399 #pragma pointer_size restore
00400 #endif
00401     int slots;
00402 
00403     for (i = 0; i < table->size; i++) {
00404         nodelist = table->subtables[i].nodelist;
00405         slots = table->subtables[i].slots;
00406         for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
00407             f = nodelist[j];
00408             while (f != NULL) {
00409                 f->next = Cudd_Regular(f->next);
00410                 f = f->next;
00411             }
00412         }
00413     }
00414 
00415 } /* end of ddClearGlobal */
